member.name: M:Bryan.Apellanes.Javascript.ResourceScripts.LoadScripts(System.Type)
member.summary: Loads all resource scripts in the namespace path of the specified type.

member.name: M:Bryan.Apellanes.Javascript.ResourceScripts.LoadNamespaceScripts(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.String)
member.summary: Loads embedded scripts into memory from the specified assembly in the specified namespacePath
